extension.name: Hologram
extension.author: Nik Trevallyn-Jones
extension.description:
A hologram object - a projection of a 3D object from 2D data.
An object which renders as a 3D object, even though it uses only a 2D image. This is a standard 'trick' for crowds and forests in animations.
extension.comments: This plugin was originally flagged as non-standard. With version 1.1 (and AOI 2.6), this plugin is now considered standard, and safe to install unconditionally.

history.log: - Added createHologramTool - added sequence number to generated Hologram name
- included the German helpset translation (thanks Harald!) - removed the beta flag
- changed hologra rotation axis to be Local instead of Global This makes results more intuitive when a Hologram is not perfectly vertical.
- fixed problem of reversed coordinate system conversion introduced with the AOI 2.6 compatability update.
- fixed NullPointer exception when adding a texture
- Changes to how textures are initialised - fixing problem reported by Art.
- Version for AOI 2.6 uses new RTObjectFactory interface
- Interim version -- Uses DynamicFactory for allocation
